host.label: Host
host.help: Host for the RethinkDB Database Server.

port.label: Port
port.help: Port for the RethinkDB Database Server.

user.label: Username
user.help: Username to use for authentication with the RethinkDB Database.

password.label: Password
password.help: Password to use for authentication with the RethinkDB Database.

database.label: Database Name
database.help: Database Name where data will be sent to.

table.label: Table Name
table.help: Table Name where the data will be inserted to.
